channel.title: Text on Screen. ++REP
channel.description:
Base is PI if it matters. Heres my prob, IK theres not like text spots all over the screen. However im making and interface and i need to add text at certain spots. Is there any graph so to say that shows which code is where? For example.
[code] addHoveredButton(41003, "Interfaces/Welcome/PLAYNOW", 1, 373, 49, 16004); [/code]
EDIT: That line shows a welcome button at the 16004 spot.
Im looking now and i see this code
[code] addText(41005, "Announcements:", tda, 2, 0xff981f, false, true); [/code]
It displays text on the screen but it doesnt say where it goes?

item.title: Text on Screen. ++REP
item.dc:creator: @Camballer Camballer
item.description:
@Camballer wrote:

I don’t know what you’re getting at… if there is text on the screen that you want to replace, it’s client sided. Search the text and replace it… If i’m not answering your question tell me more clearly what you mean

Read full topic
